item.title: ISP Walks Out of Piracy Talks: “We’re Not The Internet Police” | TorrentFreak
item.description: ISP Walks Out of Piracy Talks: “We’re Not The Internet Police” http://t.co/AuK4UZn2 #torrent
item.content:encoded: ISP Walks Out of Piracy Talks: “We’re Not The Internet Police” http://t.co/AuK4UZn2 #torrent A leading Australian Internet service provider has pulled out of negotiations to create a warning notice scheme aimed at reducing online piracy. iiNet, the ISP that was sued by Hollywood after refusing to help chase down alleged infringers, said that it can't make any progress with righthsolders if they don't make their content freely available at a reasonable price. The ISP adds that holding extra data on customers' habits is inappropriate and not their responsibility. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: torrentfreak.com

item.title: 「橋下さんと共同行動、十分にある」嘉田・未来代表
item.description: 参議院は兼務が可能なの？兼務できるのならば余剰人員（議員）を削減してください。 RT 「橋下さんと共同行動、十分にある」嘉田・未来代表 - 朝日新聞デジタル http://t.co/b4M0m8ml
item.content:encoded: 参議院は兼務が可能なの？兼務できるのならば余剰人員（議員）を削減してください。 RT 「橋下さんと共同行動、十分にある」嘉田・未来代表 - 朝日新聞デジタル http://t.co/b4M0m8ml ■嘉田由紀子・日本未来の党代表　知事と国会議員を兼務できないのは戦後、地方自治法をアメリカから輸入したから。フランスはもともと兼務が大前提。ドイツも（含め）ヨーロッパ型は地方の知事や市長が参議院を兼務 Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: asahi.com

item.title: Most Back Ban on High-Capacity Clips; Many See Societal Issues in Connecticut Shootings
item.description: POLL: Many See Societal Issues in CT Shootings; Most Back Ban on High-Capacity Clips http://t.co/qOkTsDGp
item.content:encoded: POLL: Many See Societal Issues in CT Shootings; Most Back Ban on High-Capacity Clips http://t.co/qOkTsDGp Supporters of gun control gather on Pennsylvania Avenue in front of the White House in Washington, Friday, Dec. 14, 2012, during a vigil for the victims of the shooting at Sandy Hook Elementary School in Newtown, Ct., and to call on President Obama to pass strong gun control laws. (Charles Dharapak/AP Photo) More than half of Americans say the school shootings in Newtown, Connecticut, reflect broader problems in society rather than an isolated act of a troubled person – more than after other recent shooting incidents, suggesting the possibility of a new national dialogue on violent crime. This ABC News/Washington… Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: abcnews.go.com

item.title: National Review Writer Doubts the Power of the Bushmaster AR-15
item.description: NRO writer scoffs at Adam Lanza's arsenal for not being all that powerful. http://t.co/zaCtwlC0 via @doublexmag
item.content:encoded: NRO writer scoffs at Adam Lanza's arsenal for not being all that powerful. http://t.co/zaCtwlC0 via @doublexmag If you, like many red-blooded Americans, plan on joining the gun shopping spree that mass shootings usually inspire, you might find yourself wondering about the Bushmaster AR-15 that Adam Lanza used in Friday's massacre. The fact that he successfully killed 27 women and children with only one target escaping with... Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: slate.com
